Custom Hard Hat Stickers

If you’re looking to make some stickers for hard hats, you’ve come to the right place.


Get started

Weatherproof Stickers for helmet or hard hat

Looking for some stickers to get the job done? Our custom hard hat stickers will hold tight no matter what, thanks to that extra thick, extra sticky vinyl. Waterproof? You bet. Weatherproof? All kinds of.

Are you in need of stickers that can withstand any task? Look no further! Our custom hard hat stickers are designed to hold tight, thanks to their extra thick and extra sticky vinyl. They are not only waterproof but also weatherproof in all kinds of conditions.

With a UV-resistant and scratch-proof finish, these stickers will maintain their impressive appearance for years to come. But why limit their use to just helmets and hard hats?

These versatile stickers are equally effective when applied to your toolbox or equipment.

And with a UV resistant and scratch proof finish, they’ll look mighty fine for years to come. But why stop there?

These nifty stickers will do just as well on your toolbox or equipment. 

  • Industrial strength vinyl
  • Construction-site friendly hard hat sticker
  • Great for important safety info
  • Die cut, easy to hand out 
  • The perfect outdoor sticker

Custom stickers to rep your company?

Looking for logo stickers or decals for floor and wall? Head on over to our business page to check out what else we can do for you.

If we can just put in our two cents, we suggest you stick with the preset material. Our other materials will still look tip-top, but durability will be affected.

And try not to go too big when making your hard hat stickers, to avoid wrinkling when applying.

 

Make custom stickers

FAQ Hard hat stickers

 

  • Can these weatherproof stickers be removed without leaving residue?
    Yes, our weatherproof stickers are designed to be removed without leaving any sticky residue behind. Simply peel them off when needed, and they will come off.
  • Are these stickers suitable for curved surfaces, such as hard hats?
    Absolutely! Our stickers are flexible and conform to curved surfaces with ease. They adhere securely to hard hats, helmets, and other equipment, providing long-lasting durability.
  • Can I customize the design of the sticker to include my company logo?
    Certainly! We offer a custom sticker design service that allows you to incorporate your company logo or any other artwork you desire. 
  • Are these stickers suitable for both indoor and outdoor use?
    Yes, our waterproof stickers are specifically designed for outdoor use. They are resistant to water, sunlight, and harsh weather conditions, making them ideal for both indoor and outdoor applications.
  • How long will these stickers last?
    When properly applied and cared for, our weatherproof stickers can last for several years. The UV-resistant and scratch-proof finish ensures that they maintain their vibrant colors and withstand daily wear and tear.

Customizable Hang Tag Stickers

Are you looking to level up your product labels? Add a sticker function to your regular ol’ tags and, voila, you’ve got yourself a Hang Tag 2.0. A nifty way to give your brand a boost, and a fun added bonus for your trusty customers. Our hang tag stickers are completely customizable, even down to hole placement, so there’s nothing holding you back from really going all out on designing them.

Hole placement on Hang Tag

Add a comment in the editor that you're making a Hang Tag sticker and we'll fix it for you. Don't forget to include a cutline for hole placement.

Build your brand

You can customize your hangtag exactly as you want. Do you want to include the logo? No problem. A picture of yourself? Sure! A cat? Yes, why not. When you have finished designing and want to provide your contact information, discount codes, or something else, we recommend adding it to the back! You can, in fact, print on the back of your sticker. It's a brilliant way to get your message out there - if you ask us. (When you order, don't forget to comment on where you want the hole in your hangtag)

 

Back paper print on your sticker

Why not give the back of the sticker some attention? With our Back Paper Print feature, you can add whatever you like on the sticker back. Perfect for important product information, leaving the front ready for a neat sticker design.

  • Multiple materials to choose from
  • Boosts your brand
  • Great added bonus for customers
  • Perfect for Back Paper Print
  • Sticks to most surfaces

Since you’re making Hang Tag Stickers, we’re guessing you probably have a business of some sort. Why not check out our business page to see what else we can do for you?

Die Cut Stickers

The mother of all stickers. These individually cut fellas are our most popular product and it’s not hard to get why – contour cut, die-cut stickers are second to none when it comes to showing off your artwork.


Get started

FREE SHIPPING

In our editor

HIGH QUALITY
Custom Stickers

WEATHER PROOF
2-4 year outdoor life

What's the deal with die-cut stickers?

Well, it's all about the cutline, folks! Die-cut stickers are like custom-cutting ninjas. They're sliced to match the exact shape of your design, which is called contour-cutting. And guess what? You can have them in pretty much any size or material you fancy. Stick 'em on a skateboard, a laptop, or even the wall - they'll fit right in. If this doesn't scream total freedom when it comes to creating your stickers, we don't know what does!

Die-cut vs kiss-cut custom sticker?

Here's the lowdown: unlike kiss-cut stickers, these bad boys are cut all the way through both the vinyl and the backing. That means your sticker isn't playing hide and seek with any extra material around it. Plus, the cutline can get seriously intricate, and we're up for the challenge.

Now, about the materials? You've got choices, my friend. Want that sleek brushed aluminum look? You got it. Feeling a bit trippy with holographic? We've got you covered. Or maybe you're all about being eco-friendly with 100% recycled kraft paper. And that's just the beginning – we've got a whole bunch of other sticker materials to explore. Oh, and if you stick with vinyl, you can choose between a glossy or matte finish. Pretty neat, right?

Size? Well, there's not much holding you back. Almost no limits here. You can go as small as 1” x 1” for those tiny details, or go big with a whopping 48” x 48”. Yep, we're talking big sticker dreams here.

Contour-cut stickers with backpaper printing

So, if your sticker checks all the right boxes, you can opt for the crackback option. It's like a sticker hack for easy backpaper removal. Oh, and speaking of that back paper, if you decide to go with vinyl for your sticker's front, you can even get a design printed on the back paper. Double the style, double the fun!

Now, about the materials – most of our options are like superheroes in disguise. They're scratch- and weatherproof, which means they'll look sharp year after year, no matter where you slap 'em. Plus, here's a bonus: When it's time to part ways with your sticker, there won't be any nasty residue left behind. It's a clean break!


MAKE DIE-CUT STICKERS


*3D/Epoxy unfortunately doesn’t work because of its polyurethane resin dome.

Why StickerApps Die Cut Stickers?

  • Die-cut stickers are custom stickers that are cut to the shape of the design.
  • They are made using a die-cutting process that precisely cuts the sticker material.
  • Die-cut stickers offer more design flexibility as they can be cut into any shape or size.
  • The stickers are printed on vinyl material that is durable and weather-resistant.
  • They can be used for various purposes like branding, promotional items, personal expression, and more.
  • Die-cut stickers can be applied to various surfaces such as laptops, water bottles, cars, and more.
  • The stickers are easy to apply and remove without leaving residue.
  • The stickers are printed with high-quality inks for vibrant colors and sharp details.
  • We have a customer support team to assist with any inquiries or issues.
  • We value eco-friendly practices and use sustainable materials in our production process.

What’s the deal with Weatherproof Stickers?

Folks, these stickers were made to see the world. They’ll put up with almost anything – glaring sun, hard rain and just about everything in between.

Our custom weatherproof stickers are:

  • UV-resistant
  • Waterproof
  • Scratchproof 
  • Fadeproof
  • Dishwasher safe

When we say withstand, we mean withstand!

The weatherproof property is thanks to the PET laminate. This means that your sticker is protected by an ultra-thin polyester film, that prevents moisture and what-not from ruining your artwork. Thanks to the PET laminate, your stickers will look dandy for up to four years, no matter what you put them through.

Waterproof stickers - all of our materials

But would we put function over form? Nope. There’s no need to give up the look of your stickers just because you need them to hold up for years to come. All of our vinyl materials (except wall stickers) are weatherproof. Make them smooth holographic, creative mirror or the classic white vinyl. 

But even though all our vinyls work, there is of course a weatherproof sticker champion – heavy duty - industrial strenght. This material is extra thick and extra sticky, which means that it’ll endure even the most extreme conditions. 

Just steer clear of adding a matte finish, as the UV-resistance won’t be as good (they’ll still be waterproof though). Stick with our glossy finish for second to none durability.

MAKE CUSTOM STICKERS

Custom stickers work on anything

And these stickers work on just about anything. You can even run them through the dishwasher, and they’ll come out looking better than ever. There’s not a whole lot that these stickers can’t handle, meaning: No limitations as to where to put them. 


On that note though. Just because they’re waterproof, doesn’t mean they can be applied to wet surfaces. Doing so kind of ruins the adhesive. Once applied though, it’s an entirely different story so make sure the surface is clean and dry, and you’ll be good to go.


Our weatherproof stickers can come as die-cut/conture cut, kiss-cut or as sticker sheets.

Get started here

USA and Canada

INSTANT PROOF
In our editor

HIGH QUALITY
Custom Stickers

WEATHER PROOF
2-4 year outdoor life

What’s the deal with Custom Sticker Sheets?

These guys are pretty much what they sound like – multiple stickers on a single sheet. And they can come in about a zillion different ways.

Multiple stickers on a single sheet

So. What exactly is a sticker sheet? Pretty much what it sounds like – multiple stickers on a single sheet. The neat thing about them is that you can add a whole load of designs, in any way you like. And these fellas are super customizable – down to the very shape of the actual sheet. There’s no need for it to be rectangular or square (unless you want that of course). Make it a heart. Or a skull. Or print your company logo. Or whatever tickles your fancy. And if you’re thinking that the actual stickers can also come in any shape, you’re right on the money. How you choose to lay them out is completely up to you, so why not go a little bananas?

Materials for your custom sheet?

What about materials for stickers? Well. Feel free to choose from whatever which one. Kraft Paper? Check. Holographic? Double check. Vinyl, Prismatic or Clear?  Check, check, check. And if you go with one of our vinyl materials, you can get a matte finish instead of glossy (just let us know in the comment section before placing your order).

What about size?

And size? You can make the sheet as big as 48” x 48”, and your stickers as small as 1” x 1”. You’ll need to have both a .075” safety margin and bleed for every sticker, and .075” spacing between stickers and edge of sheet. Check out this image to get a visual.

 Bleed

 Cutline

 Safe zone

 Full image bleed

Important! .075” bleeds, and .075” between each sticker cutline  


MAKE YOUR OWN Sticker Sheet

How to make Custom Sticker Sheets

Making your own custom sticker sheets is easy peasy. Just follow the steps below, and all that is left is to sit and wait for your stickers to land on your doorstep.

  • Choose the Square cutline option.
  • Enter the Size you want for the total sheet.
  • Select your Quantity and Material.
  • Upload your file with cutlines (see below).
  • Leave a comment on your order that it’s a sticker sheet. And don’t forget to let us know if there’s anything else, like a matte finish.


That’s it, folks. Oh, and you need to add it to your cart and pay but that’s a given.

 

Now, let’s get to the cutlines

First, you’ll need Adobe Illustrator. Simply open your artwork and do the following:

  • Create your cutline as a path.
  • Make a 100 % Magenta color swatch and name it “Die Cut Color”. Do the same if you want a shape other than a rectangle for your sheet.
  • Save file as PDF or AI. The editor should read the cutlines in your file, but if not, please let us know in the comments section to use them.


Easy peasy.


HOW TO MAKE STICKER SHEET

What’s the deal with weatherproof stickers?

Folks, these stickers were made to see the world. They’ll put up with almost anything – glaring sun, hard rain and just about everything in between.

UV-, water-, scratchproof stickers

When we say withstand, we mean withstand. Our custom weatherproof stickers are:

  • UV-resistant
  • Waterproof
  • Scratchproof 
  • Fadeproof
  • Dishwasher safe

The weatherproof property is thanks to the PET laminate. This means that your sticker is protected by an ultra-thin polyester film, that prevents moisture and what-not from ruining your artwork. Thanks to the PET laminate, your stickers will look dandy for up to four years, no matter what you put them through.

Stickers material that's waterproof

But would we put function over form? Nope. There’s no need to give up the look of your stickers just because you need them to hold up for years to come. All of our vinyl materials (except wall stickers) are weatherproof. Make them holographic, mirror or the classic white vinyl. 

But even though all our vinyls work, there is of course a weatherproof sticker champion – heavy duty. This material is extra thick and extra sticky, which means that it’ll endure even the most extreme conditions. 

Just steer clear of adding a matte finish, as the UV-resistance won’t be as good (they’ll still be waterproof though). Stick with our glossy finish for second to none durability.

And these stickers work on just about anything. You can even run them through the dishwasher, and they’ll come out looking better than ever. There’s not a whole lot that these stickers can’t handle, meaning: No limitations as to where to put them. 

On that note though. Just because they’re waterproof, doesn’t mean they can be applied to wet surfaces. Doing so kind of ruins the adhesive. Once applied though, it’s an entirely different story so make sure the surface is clean and dry, and you’ll be good to go.

Our weatherproof stickers can come as die-cut, kiss-cut or as sticker sheets.

What’s the deal with sticker sheets?

These guys are pretty much what they sound like – multiple stickers on a single sheet. And they can come in about a zillion different ways.

So. What exactly is a sticker sheet? Pretty much what it sounds like – multiple stickers on a single sheet. The neat thing about them is that you can add a whole load of designs, in any way you like. And these fellas are super customizable – down to the very shape of the actual sheet. There’s no need for it to be rectangular or square (unless you want that of course). Make it a heart. Or a skull. Or whatever tickles your fancy. And if you’re thinking that the actual stickers can also come in any shape, you’re right on the money. How you choose to lay them out is completely up to you, so why not go a little bananas?

Material and size of sticker sheets

What about material? Well. Feel free to choose from whatever which one*. Kraft Paper? Check. Holographic? Double check. Vinyl, Prismatic or Clear?  Check, check, check. And if you go with one of our vinyl materials, you can get a matte finish instead of glossy (just let us know in the comment section before placing your order).

And size? You can make the sheet as big as 122x122 cm, and your stickers as small as 3x3 cm. You’ll need to have both a 2 mm safety margin and bleed for every sticker, and 2 mm spacing between stickers and edge of sheet. Check out this image to get a visual.

MAKE YOUR sticker sheets

How sticker sheets's done

Making your own custom sticker sheets is easy peasy. Just follow the steps below, and all that is left is to sit and wait for your stickers to land on your doorstep.

  • Choose the Square cutline option.
  • Enter the Size you want for the total sheet.
  • Select your Quantity and Material.
  • Upload your file with cutlines (see below).
  • Leave a comment on your order that it’s a sticker sheet. And don’t forget to let us know if there’s anything else, like a matte finish.


That’s it, folks. Oh, and you need to add it to your cart and pay but that’s a given.

Now, let’s get to the cutlines.

First, you’ll need Adobe Illustrator. Simply open your artwork and do the following:

  • Create your cutline as a path.
  • Make a 100 % Magenta color swatch and name it “Die Cut Colour”. Do the same if you want a shape other than a rectangle for your sheet.
  • Save file as PDF or AI. The editor should read the cutlines in your file, but if not, please let us know in the comments section to use them.


Easy peasy.

What’s the deal with Die-cut stickers?

It’s all about the cutline, folks. Die-cut stickers, labels or decals are cut exactly to the shape of your design, and can come in just about any size or material you like. If this doesn’t enable total freedom when making your stickers, we don’t know what will.

These stickers, unlike kiss-cut stickers, are cut through both the vinyl and the backing which means that your sticker won’t compete with any surrounding material. The cutline can be super intricate and we’ll make it work.

Die-cut stickers materials? 

And how about material? Get them in brushed aluminium, holographic, prismatic, glitter or kraft paper. Or any of our other materials for stickers* – there’s no need to hold back. Oh, and if you stick with vinyl, you also get to choose between a glossy or matte coating. Neat, huh?

No limit as to size either. Almost. You can go as small as 3x3 cm and as big as 122x122 cm (big, we know). 

If your sticker meets the requirements, crack back is available for easier back paper removal. Oh, and speaking of back paper, if you choose vinyl for your sticker, decal or label front, printing a design on the back paper is possible.

Water- and weatherproof stickers

Almost all of our materials are scratch- and weatherproof, meaning that they’ll look good year after year no matter where you stick them. Another  perk? No icky residue left behind when you remove the sticker. But just to be on the safe side, steer clear of Heavy Duty – a material built for the most extreme conditions, that may leave a smidge or two behind (nothing that can’t be removed with a solvent though).

What’s the deal with car stickers and decals?

Our car stickers work for just about any kind of vehicle, and are perfect for getting your message out there.

First things first. Where do you want your car decal or sticker to go? You’ve got two options here – either on the window, or the body.

Let’s cover car window decals first

These fellas can go on your side window or the rear windshield. We’d advise against putting them on the front windshield, because as much as we like our custom car decals, we don’t want them impeding your driving. It’s all about visibility, folks.

Anyway. These decals can go either on the inside or the outside of the window. It all depends on where the adhesive goes. If it’s on the back, you’ve got yourself an outside decal/sticker. Application will be easier but your sticker will be subjected to more wear and tear. If you put the adhesive on the front, you’ll be applying your decal to the inside of the window which means your sticker will be protected from all the weather elements. On the other hand, application might be a bit trickier, especially if you’d like for the decal to go on the rear windshield. Either way, there are pros and cons with each, but we’re sure about one thing – whatever option you go with, you can count on your car window looking mighty fine.


MAKE CUSTOM STICKERS

Let’s move onto car body stickers

They can be applied pretty much anywhere you please – on bumpers, doors, or the hood. It all really comes down to two things, your car and the purpose of the sticker. (And your creative thinking, of course.)

If you have a van, why not make car sticker for the doors on the back? This way, everybody behind you in traffic will get a good look at your message. A real nifty way to utilize these stickers if you have a business of some sort (if you do, why not check out our business page to see what else we can do for you?). Otherwise, side displays are a neat option. This way, anyone on your side will get a good look at whatever you’re trying to get across. 

Our car decals are all kinds of weatherproof, and will hold tight for up to four years. 

Just got your car fixed? Give it at least 90 days until the paint curing process is finished. And if you’ve recently waxed your car – wait a day or two.

Whether you want to create a custom monogram logo for your big day, create elaborate centerpieces, or send a sticky “save the date”, wedding stickers are memorable and can make your entire decor aesthetic come together.

Through our easy sticker editor, you can create and upload custom designs to be printed on some seriously stunning sticker materials. We have tons of high quality optical materials like holographic, glitter, prismatic, mirror, matte, and kraft paper, that will bring some extra special flair to your big day!

With our easy to use editor you can make any kind of custom wedding sticker you can think of! But here’s a few of our favorite ideas to get you inspired.
MAKE CUSTOM STICKERS

Welcome Bags

Set the scene by creating a custom sticker label for your goodie bags. Display your monogram, names, wedding hashtags, or anything else on bags for your guests. It’s a great way to add a personal touch to welcome your guests to your celebration. 

Material suggestion: If you’re using a paper bag for your welcome bags / goodie bags, any of our materials will stick to it! The possibilities are endless.

Matchbox Labels for a Cigar Corner

Create a custom label for matchboxes in a cigar corner. Cigar corners are a great place for your guests to relax with a quality cigar during your reception. Keep up with your theme and add custom labels to your matchboxes here. It’s all about the small details. 


Material suggestion: Vinyl is a great option for matchbox labels.

Tequila Bottle Labels

Take your Tequila to the next level with a custom tequila bottle label. Make a thematic label that screams “tequila” and get your guests in the spirit of the day, literally! Keep with your theme / aesthetic or create a fun new tequila label that looks like the tequila was specifically made for your special day.. 

Material suggestion: Clear stickers make for excellent bottle labels. You can use any material on a bottle but we think that our clear and vinyl materials are the best options.

Return Address Labels

Save yourself the hassle of manually writing your return address on your invitations, save the dates, and thank you cards. Print return address labels, stick them on your envelopes, and you’re good to go. 


Material suggestion: For a return address label, we recommend printing these in mass on a sticker sheet. Sticker sheets come in vinyl and you can print up to 72 stickers per sheet. For return address stickers, we recommend opting for longer thin stickers on a sheet of 15 or 25. Use a template to help you out!

Place Cards and Name Tags

Get your guests mingling with schnazzy write-on name tags that also double as place cards. 


Material suggestion: Print these on any material you like, with “matte laminate” so you can write your guests names on them. 


Leave this comment in your order: “make kiss cut around nametag and matte laminate”. 

This will ensure your place cards / name tags are the perfect small size and you can write on them! 

Wedding Games

Set the social scene at your wedding with fun interactive games that get the guests mingling. Wedding Bingo is a great way to keep your guests entertained. We offer back-side printing for stickers so you can print a bingo card on the back paper, and have sticker bingo markers on the front! 


Material suggestion: Print on vinyl, clear, holographic, or mirror materials for the backside printing option! 


Leave this comment in your order: “make kiss cut around the X’s”

That way all of the bingo markers can come off in separate pieces.

Bottle Labels

Create gorgeous custom bottle and glassware labels for your wedding. Any of our materials will work as a label, so upload your custom design or text and present some gorgeous bottles on your special day. 


Material suggestion: We think for glassware our clear material makes a great label so you won’t have trim around your design. For bottles we recommend our classic white vinyl.


Recommended size: ca. 3.5” x 4”

Invitations and Save the Dates

Create a special sticky reminder or invitation that your invited guests can stick somewhere so they don’t forget the date! You can also opt for a printed invitation on the backside with back paper printing, and a fun sticker of you and your betrothed or diary reminder sticker on the other side. 


Material suggestion: For back paper printing, choose vinyl, holographic, mirror, or clear material.

Difference between die cut and kiss cut?

You've probably heard of 'die cut' stickers, but what's the deal with 'kiss cut'? Well, here's the scoop: unlike die-cut stickers, kiss-cut ones are like a sticker sheet's best friend. They're cut through the vinyl but not the backing, so it's like your stickers are hanging out on a sheet.

Kiss-cut stickers are your ticket to easy-peel city, thanks to that extra vinyl border around your sticker. Even with those intricate cut lines, you've got some extra backing left when you peel your sticker off. And guess what? Once you've stuck 'em on, both kiss-cut and die-cut stickers look exactly the same. It's all about that smooth sticker style!

 

MAKE KISS CUT STICKERS

Why We Love Kiss Cut Stickers

  • All that extra vinyl works as a protective frame, keeping delicate cutlines protected from getting bent until application
  • Works on any material
  • Easy to peel
  • Can be applied to any size sticker
  • They are compatible with back paper printing
  • You can have a decorative vinyl sheet where your kiss cut stickers will live until they are peeled off

DECK OUT YOUR DECK

New to decking out your board? Skateboard stickers are usually placed on the underside of your skateboard's top deck to make your board uniquely yours. Whether you want your skateboard to have a certain aesthetic or if you just want to plaster some sick sticks to give your board some personality, the choice is up to you. 

THE LONG-LASTING SKATEBOARD STICKER

These little dudes have a scratch-proof, PET-laminate film that is built to last through all the grinding, kickflipping, and rail sliding. Not to mention, they can withstand any kind of weathering elements and any *potential* wipe outs for up to four years. Glossy vinyl stickers are also UV protected, so they stay vibrant and fresh longer, and won’t face much sun damage in their 4-year lifetime.

STICKERS FOR ALL THE BOARDS

Skateboards, snowboards, surfboards, longboard - our vinyl scratch proof stickers can be slapped on all of your sport equipment. Just make sure the surface is clean and dry when you're applying the stickers and you're good to go.

 

IN THE BUSINESS?

Own a longboard-, skateshop or other small business? You can create and upload any design or logo you want and order stickers in bulk. Just upload your best selling designs or create some funky new ones and order as many as you like. 

Stickers by Lessthanlocal

PERSONALIZE YOUR GEAR

Stick ‘em on your helmet, on your skis, on your racks, and on your knee (pads). There’s no better way to give your gear some personality than to decorate it up with some stickers that resonate with you

What’s not to love about logo stickers?

Logo stickers can seriously step up your branding. Your logo can be your customers' first impression of your company and we want to make sure that your logotype comes out looking legit. So here are a few things to remember.

  • You can print your logo on any of our materials! But if you want to slap these bad boys on surfaces that will be outdoors, we say stay away from our Kraft Paper material. It isn’t waterproof.
  • If you want your logo stickers to have some longevity, opt for vinyl stickers with a glossy laminate. They’ll last for up to 4 years, indoors and outdoors.
  • Laminates, with the exception of pink ink and matte, are UV protected and won’t lose their personality even in direct sunlight
  • Logo stickers can literally be used for anything. Decor, branding, marketing, or heck even selling them as merch if you have a fire logo your customers love.
  • Whatever the design, you can upload it in our super easy sticker editor, and get instant proof in seconds.

10 halloween sticker ideas for an extra spirited holiday

Need some Halloween decorating inspiration? Or want to bewitch your business for the spooky season? These are our top tips on how to use Halloween stickers to decorate your home and business.

10 halloween sticker ideas

For an extra spirited holiday

1. Bring your favorite creepy characters to life with 3D stickers

Bring ghosts, ghouls, zombies, and all their friends to life by making 3D Halloween stickers. 3D Epoxy stickers are made with a polyurethane resin to add some depth to your normal 2D flat stickers. Stick em’ on your kids lunch box, on your laptop or water bottle, or use them in your Halloween arts and crafts like on picture frames and in scrapbooks

Insider suggestions: 3D eyeballs, rounded pumpkins

2. Make your house or office look haunted with window stickers

Transparent halloween stickers can turn any window or glass surface into a haunting scene. Use window stickers to decorate the front windows of your home. Whatever look you want, whether you want to slap some shadowy figures in the windows or stick on some friendly little ghosts to greet your guests, window stickers are a fun and easy way to decorate for Halloween.

3. Create Halloween jar labels

Create a festive feel in your kitchen with halloween jar labels and stickers. Create vintage inspired halloween labels with kraft paper material for a rustic and spooky vibe. Place the labels on display jars and containers to leave on your kitchen counter to bring Halloween to every corner of your home.

4. Design deadly door stickers

Enter if you dare? Halloween door stickers are great for front doors and bedroom doors. Decorate the exterior of your home with door stickers to welcome and warn the trick or treaters. Create a harrowing crime scene with a do not enter sticker, or create a warm greeting with festive fall aspects. Whatever your scene is, door stickers can seriously set the tone.

5. Create spine-chilling scenes with Halloween wall stickers

Wall Stickers are the best option for creating haunted houses, haunted mazes, or for turning the workplace into a truly terrifying place to be. Wall stickers can be anything from Halloween greetings and elements, to scary iconic characters like Freddie Kruger and IT.

Insider suggestion: Create fake windows with Halloween wall stickers to build haunted hallways.

6. Decorate your business packaging

Use Halloween stickers to step up your business aesthetic. If you have a physical product or mail you send to customers and clients, take it one step further this Halloween season by decorating your packaging or products. Your customer or recipients will remember the extra effort.

7. Create vinyl decals for witchy wine lovers

The rain is falling, leaves are on the ground, it's time to light a candle and pull out the old arts and crafts bin! Step up your Halloween arts and craft game with vinyl decals. Vinyl Halloween decals are perfect for creating your own custom glassware.

Insider suggestion: Create a special spooky wine glass or glass mug with clear stickers. These transparent vinyl decals are dishwasher safe!
8. Send out limited edition Halloween logo stickers

Make your brand stand out with a seasonal twist. Fans of your brand will love a halloween inspired logo sticker. Keep your design, add some seasonal colors or elements and sell your logo sticker or send them out with your products. Seasonal branding is a great way to celebrate the seasons and promote your business.

9. Skip carving; decorate your pumpkin with stickers instead

Use stickers to decorate your pumpkin and skip the carving. Your pumpkins will last longer, and it’s kid-safe. Want to stick to the classical carving? Use stickers to create stencils for carving.

Insider suggestion: use clear stickers to create transparent pumpkin stencils.

Whether you want to make a whole page of easily peelable stickers, or just want your individual stickers to have a larger backing, opting for kiss cut stickers is a fabulous choice.

Difference between die cut and kiss cut?

You might be familiar with ‘die cut’ but what makes a kiss cut sticker different? These stickers, unlike die cut, are cut through the vinyl but not the backing. Think of it like a sticker sheet.

Kiss cut stickers are easier to peel off, thanks to all that extra vinyl around your sticker. With a kiss cut you can still make super intricate cut lines, you’ll just have extra backing left over once you peek your sticker off. And best of all? Once applied both kiss-cut and die-cut look the same

 

Personalised Kiss cut Sticker

Easy to peel kiss cut stickers

 

Kiss cut stickers business card

Why We Love Kiss Cut Stickers

  • All that extra vinyl works as a protective frame, keeping delicate cutlines protected from getting bent until application
  • Works on any material
  • Can be applied to any size sticker
  • They are compatible with back paper printing
  • You can have a decorative vinyl sheet where your kiss cut stickers will live until they are peeled off

Naklejki na okno

Naklejki na okno są doskonałe na witryny sklepowe i wszystkie szyby.

WAŻNE!
W zamówieniu zostaw nam komentarz “naklejka na okno,” żebyśmy je odpowiednio wydrukowali.

STWÓRZ SWOJE NAKLEJKI

Klej z przodu naklejki
Przykleisz naklejki przodem do szyby

Usuwalne
Naklejki nie zostawią śladu

Druk czterokolorowy (CMYK)
+ biały

NAKLEJKI DO PERSONALNEGO LUB BIZNESOWEGO UŻYTKU

Nie ważne czy tworzysz naklejki na okno do swojego domu czy na witrynę sklepową, naklejki na okno są wytrzymałe i będą wyglądać świeżo na Twoich oknach przez lata. Naklejki są łatwe w aplikacji i świetnie sprawdzą się w celach informacyjnych. Mają również ochronę przed promieniowaniem UV, więc kolory nie wyblakną nawet przez 4 lata, nawet w świetle słonecznym oświetlającym je przez szybę.

NATYCHMIASTOWY PODGLĄD W NASZYM EDYTORZE

W naszym edytorze możesz stworzyć dowolny projekt, który chciał*byś mieć na oknie. Po prostu stwórz naklejkę na przezroczystym materiale i zostaw nam komentarz “naklejka na okno”. Dodamy klej na przodzie naklejki, aby dało się je przykleić na szybę.

NIESKOŃCZONE MOŻLIWOŚCI

Naklejki na okno są doskonałym sposobem na personalizację witryny Twojego sklepu czy branding firmy. Dodaj nazwę, logo, godziny otwarcia albo cokolwiek chcesz, aby przyciągało uwagę przechodniów.

WYSTAWA SZTUKI W WITRYNIE SKLEPU

Dlaczego kochamy naklejki z logo?

Naklejki z logo mogą naprawdę przenieść Twoją markę na wyższy poziom. Świetne logo zrobi dobre pierwsze wrażenie na Twoich klientach, więc chcemy Ci pomóc, aby Twoje naklejki były naprawdę niezapomniane. Oto kilka rzeczy, które należy wziąć pod uwagę:

  • Możesz wydrukować swoje logo na dowolnym materiale. Ale jeśli chcesz używać naklejek na zewnątrz, nie polecamy papieru kraft, bo nie jest wodoodporny.
  • Jeśli chcesz, aby naklejki przetrwały długi czas, nasz regularny materiał winylowy z wykończeniem z połyskiem jest najlepszą opcją. Jest odporny na promieniowanie UV i przetrwa do 4 lat, wewnątrz i na zewnątrz.
  • Naklejki z logo mogą być użyte do wszystkiego, w każdej sytuacji. Wykorzystaj je do dekoracji, brandingu, marketingu albo sprzedaj je w swoim sklepie, jeśli klienci naprawdę lubią Twoje logo.
  • Swój projekt możesz łatwo załadować w naszym prostym w użyciu kreatorze online. Otrzymasz natychmiastowy automatyczny podgląd w kilka sekund.

Motorcycle stickers are slick long-lasting decal-like stickers that can be placed on your bike and won’t leave any long term residue or damage on your fuel tank, your rear fender, or wherever you want them to go. Here’s a few important things to remember when constructing your motorcycle sticker.

  • You can print your motorcycle stickers on any of our materials! But since your bike will be exposed to the elements, we say stay away from our Kraft Paper material. It ain’t waterproof.
  • If you want your motorbike stickers to have some longevity, opt for vinyl stickers with glossy laminate. They’ll last for up to 4 years.
  • Whether you’re selling motorcycle branded stickers or want to deck out your own bike, whatever the design, you can upload it in our super easy sticker editor and get an instant proof in seconds.

Décorez votre Skate

Vous n'avez pas l'habitude de décorer votre skate ? Les autocollants de skateboard sont généralement placés sous votre planche pour la rendre unique. Que vous souhaitiez que votre skateboard ait une certaine esthétique ou que vous vouliez simplement coller des autocollants de malade pour donner de la personnalité à votre planche, le choix vous appartient. 

L'autocollant durable pour Skateboard

Ces petits gars ont un film PET laminé résistant aux rayures, conçu pour durer malgré le broyage, le kickflipping et le glissement des rails. Sans oublier qu'ils peuvent résister à toutes sortes d'intempéries et à tous les accidents *potentiels* pendant quatre ans. Ils sont également protégés contre les UV, ce qui leur permet de conserver leur éclat et leur fraîcheur plus longtemps et de ne pas subir de dommages dus au soleil pendant leur durée de vie de 4 ans.

Des autocollants pour toutes les planches

Skateboards, Snowboards, Surfboards, nos autocollants en vinyle anti-rayures peuvent être apposés sur toutes vos planches et vos équipements sportifs. Veillez simplement à ce que la surface soit propre et sèche lorsque vous appliquez les autocollants et vous serez prêt à partir.

Dans les affaires?

Vous êtes propriétaire d'un skateshop ou d'une autre petite entreprise ? Vous pouvez créer et télécharger le design ou le logo de votre choix et commander des autocollants en gros. Téléchargez simplement vos designs les plus vendus ou créez-en de nouveaux et commandez-en autant que vous le souhaitez.

Personnalisez votre équipement

Collez-les sur votre casque, sur vos skis, sur vos porte-bagages et sur vos genouillères. Il n'y a pas de meilleur moyen de donner de la personnalité à votre équipement que de le décorer avec des autocollants qui vous ressemblent.

Recommandations sur les produits

Les autocollants pour skateboard peuvent être petits, grands, super brillants ou en noir et blanc. Mais voici nos deux cents sur ce qui sont généralement les options les plus populaires lors de la création d'autocollants pour skateboards.

Pourquoi aimons-nous les sticker pour skate

Améliorez facilement votre planche avec des autocollants de skateboard personnalisés. Vous pouvez montrer vos propres dessins et rendre votre skateboard super personnalisé. Mais pour être sûr que vos autocollants de skateboard aient l'air légitimes, voici quelques points à retenir.

  • Vous pouvez imprimer vos autocollants de skateboard sur n'importe lequel de nos matériaux. Mais le vinyle et les matériaux résistants dureront le plus longtemps et seront les plus durables pour votre skateboard.

  • Notre laminé brillant est protégé contre les UV, de sorte que les autocollants ne perdent pas leur personnalité, même en plein soleil.

Preuve instantanée avec notre Sticker Maker

Comment ne pas aimer les autocollants de logo?

Les autocollants de logo peuvent sérieusement améliorer votre image de marque. Votre logo peut être la première impression que vos clients ont de votre entreprise et nous voulons nous assurer que votre logotype a l'air légitime. Voici donc quelques points à retenir.

  • Vous pouvez imprimer votre logo sur tous nos matériaux! Mais si vous voulez apposer ces badges sur des surfaces qui seront à l'extérieur, nous vous conseillons de ne pas utiliser notre papier kraft. Il n'est pas imperméable.
  • Si vous voulez que vos autocollants aient une certaine longévité, optez pour des autocollants en vinyle avec un laminé brillant. Ils dureront jusqu'à 4 ans, à l'intérieur comme à l'extérieur..
  • Les laminés, à l'exception de l'encre rose et du mat, sont protégés contre les UV et ne perdront pas leur personnalité même en plein soleil.
  • Les autocollants de logo peuvent littéralement servir à tout. Décoration, image de marque, marketing, voire même vente de produits dérivés si vous avez un logo de feu que vos clients adorent.
  • Quel que soit le design, vous pouvez le télécharger dans notre éditeur d'autocollants super facile, et obtenir une épreuve instantanée en quelques secondes.

C'est quoi le délire avec les stickers Weatherproof ?

Les gars, ces stickers ont été faits pour voir le monde. Ils résistent à presque tout - soleil éblouissant, pluie battante et à peu près tout ce qui se trouve entre les deux.

Nos stickers personnalisés résistants aux intempéries sont :

  • Résistants aux UV
  • Étanches
  • Résistants aux rayures
  • Inaltérables
  • Lavables au lave-vaisselle

Quand nous disons résistants, nous voulons dire résistants !

La propriété résistante aux intempéries est due au laminé PET. Cela signifie que votre sticker est protégé par un film de polyester ultra-fin qui empêche l'humidité et autres éléments de ruiner votre œuvre d'art. Grâce au laminé PET, vos stickers auront l'air super pendant jusqu'à quatre ans, peu importe ce que vous leur faites subir.

Stickers étanches - tous nos matériaux

Mais sacrifier l'esthétique pour la fonctionnalité ? Jamais. Pas besoin de renoncer au look de vos stickers juste parce que vous avez besoin qu'ils tiennent pendant des années. Tous nos matériaux en vinyle (sauf les stickers muraux) sont résistants aux intempéries. Choisissez entre un holographique lisse, un miroir créatif ou le classique vinyle blanc.

Mais même si tous nos vinyles fonctionnent, il y a bien sûr un champion des stickers résistants aux intempéries - le heavy duty - résistance industrielle. Ce matériau est extra épais et extra collant, ce qui signifie qu'il résistera même aux conditions les plus extrêmes.

Évitez simplement d'ajouter une finition mate, car la résistance aux UV ne sera pas aussi bonne (mais ils resteront étanches). Optez pour notre finition brillante pour une durabilité incomparable.

CRÉER DES STICKERS PERSONNALISÉS

Les stickers personnalisés fonctionnent sur tout

Ces stickers fonctionnent sur presque tout. Vous pouvez même les passer au lave-vaisselle et ils en ressortiront encore plus beaux. Il n'y a pas grand-chose que ces stickers ne peuvent pas supporter, ce qui signifie qu'il n'y a pas de limites quant à l'endroit où les mettre.


Cela dit, le fait qu'ils soient imperméables ne signifie pas qu'ils peuvent être appliqués sur des surfaces mouillées. Cela ruine un peu l'adhésif. Une fois appliqués, c'est une toute autre histoire, alors assurez-vous que la surface est propre et sèche, et vous êtes prêt à partir.


Nos stickers résistants aux intempéries peuvent être découpés en contour, en forme de baiser ou en feuilles de stickers.

Quel est le deal avec les autocollants et les décalcomanies de voiture ?

Nos autocollants de voiture fonctionnent pour presque tous les types de véhicules et sont parfaits pour faire passer votre message.

Premièrement, où voulez-vous que votre décalcomanie ou autocollant de voiture aille ? Vous avez deux options ici - soit sur la vitre, soit sur la carrosserie.

Commençons par les décalcomanies de vitre de voiture

Ces gars-là peuvent aller sur votre vitre latérale ou la lunette arrière. Nous vous déconseillons de les mettre sur le pare-brise avant, car autant nous aimons nos décalcomanies de voiture personnalisées, nous ne voulons pas qu'elles entravent votre conduite. Tout est une question de visibilité, les amis.

De toute façon. Ces décalcomanies peuvent aller soit à l'intérieur soit à l'extérieur de la vitre. Tout dépend de l'endroit où va l'adhésif. Si c'est à l'arrière, vous avez une décalcomanie/autocollant extérieur. L'application sera plus facile mais votre autocollant sera soumis à plus d'usure. Si vous mettez l'adhésif à l'avant, vous appliquerez votre décalcomanie à l'intérieur de la vitre, ce qui signifie que votre autocollant sera protégé de tous les éléments météorologiques. D'un autre côté, l'application pourrait être un peu plus difficile, surtout si vous voulez que la décalcomanie aille sur la lunette arrière. Dans tous les cas, il y a des avantages et des inconvénients à chaque option, mais nous sommes sûrs d'une chose - quelle que soit l'option que vous choisissez, vous pouvez compter sur votre vitre de voiture qui aura l'air superbe.


CRÉER DES AUTOCOLLANTS PERSONNALISÉS

Passons aux autocollants pour carrosserie de voiture

Ils peuvent être appliqués pratiquement n'importe où - sur les pare-chocs, les portes ou le capot. Tout dépend vraiment de deux choses : votre voiture et le but de l'autocollant. (Et votre créativité, bien sûr.)

Si vous avez une camionnette, pourquoi ne pas faire un autocollant pour les portes arrière ? De cette façon, tout le monde derrière vous dans la circulation pourra voir votre message. Une façon vraiment astucieuse d'utiliser ces autocollants si vous avez une entreprise de quelque sorte que ce soit (si c'est le cas, pourquoi ne pas consulter notre page entreprise pour voir ce que nous pouvons faire d'autre pour vous ?). Sinon, les affichages latéraux sont une option sympa. De cette façon, quiconque est sur votre côté pourra voir ce que vous essayez de faire passer.

Nos autocollants pour voiture sont résistants à toutes sortes de conditions météorologiques et tiendront fermement pendant jusqu'à quatre ans.

Venez de faire réparer votre voiture ? Attendez au moins 90 jours jusqu'à ce que le processus de durcissement de la peinture soit terminé. Et si vous avez récemment ciré votre voiture - attendez un jour ou deux.
